None.Name: Gifted Unbreakable
None.Description: Seals every friendly orb, power generator and wall segment in the current game off behind a magical barrier that absorbs 60% of all incoming damage for 15 seconds. The affected structures will additionally regenerate 50 lifepoints every 2 seconds. Reusable every 30 seconds.
